data.system_settings: Mac OS Mojave 10.14.1 (18B75) Firefox Stable (63.0.3) and Firefox Developer (65.0b3)

data.actual_result: Top corners should stay rounded like in Safari and Chrome.

data.short_description: While hovering over a game cover in Check them out section of the nitro marketing page (/nitro) using Firefox the top two corners they no longer become rounded.
data.steps_to_repro: - Visit The Website - Hover over a game icon under the "Get access to over - Visit
